alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 30 at 5:54PM MST until July 30 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... The Antelope Creek basin in... Coconino County in north central Arizona... * Until 900 PM MST. * At 554 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over the Antelope Creek basin. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Antelope Creek basin. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Antelope Creek basin. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Page, Antelope Canyon Near Sr 98, Antelope Creek Basin, Glen Canyon National Recreation Area, Lake Powell and Navajo Reservation. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Antelope Creek. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Immediately move out of and away from creeks and washes in the Antelope Creek basin. Flash flooding is occurring or imminent. Turn Around, Don`t Drown if you encounter flood waters while driving.
